document.full_text: the air traffic controller who sent a jet carrying michelle obama too close to an air force cargo plane did warn the pilot of the passenger jet to beware of the bigger plane's wake turbulence.
document.title: washington: washington: first lady's plane was warned of turbulence
lines_and_colors: the air traffic controller who sent a jet carrying michelle obama too close to an air force cargo plane did warn the pilot of the passenger jet to beware of the bigger plane's wake turbulence.
